# Load packages, paths, functions
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Load main packages, paths and custom functions
source("../../../source/main_packages.R")
source("../../../source/paths.R")
source("../../../source/functions.R")

# Load supplementary packages
packages <- c("Biostrings", "msa")
invisible(lapply(packages, require, character.only = TRUE))
```

# Make alignment
```{r warning=FALSE}
# Wolbachia
make_alignment(path_input=path_tsv, 
               path_output=path_plot, 
               genus="wolbachia", 
               oligo_zoom=c(190, 280))

# Asaia
make_alignment(path_input=path_tsv, 
               path_output=path_plot, 
               genus="asaia", 
               oligo_zoom=c(200, 270))

# Chryseobacterium
make_alignment(path_input=path_tsv, 
               path_output=path_plot, 
               genus="chryseobacterium",
               oligo_zoom=c(85,385))

# Elizabethkingia
make_alignment(path_input=path_tsv, 
               path_output=path_plot, 
               genus="elizabethkingia",
               oligo_zoom=c(250,270))

# Erwinia
make_alignment(path_input=path_tsv, 
               path_output=path_plot, 
               genus="erwinia",
               oligo_zoom=c(90,120))

# Legionella
make_alignment(path_input=path_tsv, 
               path_output=path_plot, 
               genus="legionella", 
               oligo_zoom=c(60,270))

# Serratia
make_alignment(path_input=path_tsv, 
               path_output=path_plot, 
               genus="serratia", 
               oligo_zoom=c(90,120))
```
